link.title: Domino
link.content:
I'm feeling sexy and free /我感觉性感自在
Like glitter's raining on me/全身散发闪耀光芒
You like a shot of pure gold/而你就像纯金般夺我眼目
I think I'm 'bout to explode/我想我无法镇定了
I can taste by lovechiucc the tension like a cloud of smoke in the air
/我感受紧张感就像散在空中的烟云
Now I'm breathing like I'm running cause you're taking me there
/因为你带我来这 让我现在呼吸急促像奔跑过
Don't you know...you spin me out of control/难道你不知道 你让我快失控了
Ooh ooh ooh
We can do this all night/我们可以彻夜不眠
turn this club, skin tight/嗨翻夜店 贴身共舞 
Baby come on/宝贝 快来吧
Ooh ooh ooh
Pull me like a bass drum/低音鼓打出激情
Sparkin' up a rhythm/节奏中擦出爱的火花
Baby, come on!/宝贝 快来吧!
Ooh ooh ooh ooh
Rock my world into the sunlight/在阳光散发中 震撼我的世界 
Make this dream the best I've ever known/让美梦 从未如此美妙精彩
Dirty dancing in the by lovechiucc moonlight/在月光洒落中 放纵舞吧
Take me down like I'm a domino/推倒我像多米诺骨牌
Every second is a highlight/每一秒都如此珍贵
When we touch don't ever let me go/一旦接触就抓紧我别放手
Dirty dancing in the moonlight/在月光洒落中 放纵舞吧
Take me down like I'm a domino/推倒我像多米诺骨牌
You got me loosing my mind/你让我意乱神迷
My heart beats out of time/心狂跳 时间错乱
I'm seeing Hollywood stars/就像看见好莱坞的巨星
You stroke me like a guitar/你对我弹奏出爱的恋曲
I can taste the tension like a cloud of smoke in the air
/我感受紧张感就像散在空中的烟云
Now I'm breathing like I'm running by lovechiucc cause you're taking me there
/因为你带我来这 让我现在呼吸急促像奔跑过
Don't you know...you spin me out of control/难道你不知道 你让我快失控了

turn this club, skin tight/嗨翻夜店 贴身共舞

link.title: Rolling in the deep
link.content:
Rolling In The Deep (Live) - KZ·谭定安

Written by：Adele Adkins/Paul Epworth

原唱：Adele

编曲/Program:刘洲

定位制作人：刘洲

We could have had it all

Rolling in the deep

You had my heart

Inside of your hands

And you played it

You played it

You played it

There's a fire starting in my heart

Reaching a fever pitch

And it's bringing me out the dark

Finally I can see you crystal clear

Go ahead and sell me out

And I'll lay your ship bare

See how I'll leave with every piece of you

Don't underestimate the things that I will do

There's a fire starting in my heart

Reaching a fever pitch

And it's bringing me out the dark

The scars of your love

Remind me of us

They keep me thinking

That we almost had it all

The scars of your love

They leave me breathless

I can't help feeling

We could have had it all

Rolling in the deep

You had my heart inside of your hands

And you played it you played it

You played it

We could have had it all

Rolling in the deep

You had my heart inside of your hands

And you played it to the beat

歌词大意：

看过来

一起帮助寻找真相的人们

我拼命地把我的信息推送出去

去证明你跟我所说的话并不相配

你抵抗不了我的警告

现在开始

因痛楚而提醒身体

我正在警告那些带来伤害的人

带着猛烈的举动

现在你终于明白

把我的心伤透是个巨大的错误

当心我说的每一个字

你将忍受不了你的所作所为

带来的后果

我跟你所说的话

将让你停止并意识到曾做过的一切

难以置信

坚强激烈

我虽害怕但我内心强大

Ladies and Gentlemen

Throw your soul through every open door

Count your blessings to find what you look for

Turn my sorrow into treasured gold

You'll pay me back in kind and reap just what you sow

We could have had it all

You had my heart

Inside of your hands

And you played it

You played it

You played it

We could have had it all

Rolling in the deep

You had my heart

Inside of your hands

And you played it

You played it

You played it

You played it to the beat

link.title: Ain't Nobody
link.content:
Ain't Nobody (Live) - Jessie J

Written by：Hawk Wolinski

原唱：Rufus/ Chaka Khan

编曲/Program：尼克

Ain't nobody

Loves me better

Makes me happy

Makes me feel this way

Ain't nobody

Loves me better than you

Captured effortlessly

That's the way it was

Happened so naturally

How didn't I know it was love

The next thing I felt was you

Holding me close

What was I gonna do

I let myself go

And now we're flying through the stars

Hope this night will last forever

I've been waiting for you

It's been so long

I knew just what I would do

When I heard your song

Filled my heart with your bliss

Gave me freedom

I know I could not resist

I needed someone

Now I'm flying through the stars

Hope this night will last forever

Ain't nobody

Loves me better

Makes me happy

Makes me feel this way

Ain't nobody

Loves me better

Makes me happy

Makes me feel this way

I wait for night time to come

To bring you to me

Can't believe I'm the one

I was so lonely

Feel like I must be dream

I need this dream to be

I need this dream to be real

I must be dreaming

Make my wish upon a star

Hope this night will last forever

Ain't nobody nobody

Makes me happy

Makes me feel this way

Ain't nobody nobody

Loves me better than you

At first you put your arms around me

Then you put your charms around me

I can't resist this sweet surrender

Of the nights so warm and tender

We stare into each other's eyes

And what we see is no surprise

Got a feeling most would treasure

And a love so deep we cannot measure

Nobody

Makes me feel this way

Makes me feel this way

Ain't nobody

Loves me better

Ain't nobody

Makes me feel this way

Nobody

Makes me feel this way

Ain't nobody nobody

No

Baby

Nobody nobody

Baby

Nobody makes me feel better than you

link.title: Say   Something
link.content:
Say Something (Live) - KZ·谭定安

词：Ian Axel/Chad Vaccarino/Mike Campbell

曲：Ian Axel/Chad Vaccarino/Mike Campbell

编曲：KZ谭定安/Makoy Portado

原唱：A Great Big World/Christina Aguilera

吉他：Makoy Portado

Program：梁翘柏

制作人：KZ谭定安/Makoy Portado

Say something I'm giving up on you

I'll be the one if you want me to

Anywhere I would've followed you

Say something I'm giving up on you

And I am feeling so small

It was over my head

I know nothing at all

And I will stumble and fall

I'm still learning to love

Just starting to crawl

Say something I'm giving up on you

I'm sorry that I couldn't get to you

Anywhere I would've followed you

Say something I'm giving up on you

Say something I'm giving up on you

I'll be the one if you want me to

Say something I'm giving up on you
